text: HEK293T cells (ATCC #CRL-3216) and CRFK cells (feline kidney, ATCC #CCL-94) were cultured in Dulbecco's modified Eagle media (Sigma, #D6429) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (Sigma, #F2442), 2 mM L-glutamine (Invitrogen, #25030-081), and 1% antibiotics (Corning, #30-002). Cells were cultured at 37˚C and in 5% CO 2 . Primary and immortalized cell lines from primate species (see S4 Fig) were grown in Dulbecco's modified Eagle media (fibroblasts) or RPMI-1640 (B-Lymphocytes; Sigma, #R0883) supplemented with 15% fetal bovine serum, 2 mM L-glutamine, and 1% antibiotics. Cells were cultured at 37˚C and in 5% CO 2 .
